Class WindowChrome

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.ui.chrome.WindowChrome
public final class WindowChrome extends Object
Utility methods for borderless windows with rounded corners and drag handling.

Provides helpers to make a frame undecorated with rounded corners and to install a drag handler so a component can move the window.

  • Method Details

    • makeBorderlessWithRoundedCorners

      public static void makeBorderlessWithRoundedCorners(JFrame frame)
      Makes the frame borderless and applies rounded corners.

      Sets the frame to undecorated, applies a transparent background, and keeps a rounded shape synchronized with size changes using AppTheme.WINDOW_CORNER_ARC.

      Parameters:
      frame - the frame to modify; no action if null

    • installDragHandler

      public static void installDragHandler(JFrame frame, JComponent dragHandle)
      Installs a drag handler so dragging the given component moves the frame. Intended for use with borderless windows.
      Parameters:
      frame - the frame to move; no action if null
      dragHandle - the component acting as a drag handle; no action if null
